about_the_game:
A powerful storm shipwrecks Feng Haiping and his companions, Liang Feng and Liang Yu, on their way back home after leaving Fuling Island. When Feng Haiping wakes up on the shore, he discovers that Liang Feng and Liang Yu are missing. A stone monument near the beach reveals that this place is the lost kingdom of Yamatai, recorded as early as the Wei and Jin dynasties...

New Mode


Experience the new Roguelike gameplay mode. Players will face new enemies and must conquer three different domains. Each level will be randomly generated and filled with powerful accessories that provide strong buffs when combined to help you overcome harder and harder challenges.

New Maps


Explore the mysterious lost kingdom of Yamatai, a land of myth and legends. Its location was lost to time centuries before the time of Feng Haiping – and now fate has brought him to its fabled shores. With five new domain maps, Yamatai offers unique atmospheres and new challenges for you to face.

New Bosses


Put your combat skills to the test against five new bosses, mysterious supernatural entities known as yokai – demons, spirits, monsters of legends and folk tales, each of them with unique powers and abilities.

New Equipment


Five new sets of armor are available for you... if you manage to defeat their wearers! On top of that, the armor sets of the base game have been revised with new attributes, and their enhanced versions can be purchased in the shop.

New Skills


Beat the illusory images of the bosses of The Last Soldier of the Ming Dinasty to unlock new powerful sub-weapon skills.

Shop Feature


Use the copper coins that you obtain in the Roguelike mode to purchase new equipment, weapons, and armors in the Shop.
